pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Django IAM database backends## Usage```shellpip install django-iam-dbauth```In your settings use the following```pythonDATABASES = { "default": { "HOST": "<hostname>", "USER": "<user>", "ENGINE": 'django_iam_dbauth.aws.postgresql' "OPTIONS": { "use_iam_auth": True } }}```
